short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast and accurate transcriptions on Mac

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your transcription workflow with the QuickWhisper Chrome Extension. Submit URLs of any audio or video content to QuickWhisper (quickwhisper.app) with just one click of a button.

QuickWhisper is a MacOS application that transcribes any audio and video content directly on your Mac using powerful OpenAI's Whisper. All processing and storage occur locally on your device, ensuring that your data remains private and secure.

Work perfectly for:
– Webinars and lectures
– Video conferences
– In-person meetings and phone calls
– ﻿﻿Business negotiation
– Job interviews
– Creating subtitles for videos
– Podcasts and Audiobooks
– ﻿﻿Language learning
...any speech content you can think of
